segments.text: I wonder if I can ask you a question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ask me a question ? What do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well ... er ... it is just ... just that I ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just what ? Stop beating around the bush . Tell me what you want to know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ... er ... I just want to know if you could lend me a few bucks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lend you a few bucks ? No way ! Still remember the money you borrowed me last time ?
segments.speaker: S2
